title: Find Office Lease Space for Client
description: A tech startup needs to find a 5,000 sqft office space for lease. The agent must search for suitable properties.

tasks.description: Identify the client's requirements: 5,000 sqft, Class A/B office, specific submarket, budget of $50/sqft/year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly logs all client requirements.

tasks.description: Search commercial listing services (e.g., CoStar, LoopNet) for available properties matching the criteria.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of at least 5 matching properties.

tasks.description: Compile the search results into a report for the client, including property photos, floor plans, and leasing contact info.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a professional, easy-to-read report for the client.
